gw.plugin.security

Interface AuthenticationServicePluginCallbackHandler


  • public interface AuthenticationServicePluginCallbackHandler
    Callback handler used by the AuthenticationServicePlugin to communicate with the server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String findUser(java.lang.String credentialName)
      Queries the internal system for the identifier specified.
      void modifyUser(java.lang.String publicId, UserValueNVP[] pathValues)
      Modifies the information in the user data object.
      CredentialVerificationResult verifyInternalCredential(java.lang.String publicId, java.lang.String rawPassword)
      Verifies that the given credential is usable by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • findUser

        java.lang.String findUser(java.lang.String credentialName)
        Queries the internal system for the identifier specified. If found, the user object is returned. If not found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        credentialName - The user name to find the public id for
        Returns:
        The user information of the user if found, null if not.

      • verifyInternalCredential

        CredentialVerificationResult verifyInternalCredential(java.lang.String publicId,
                                                    java.lang.String rawPassword)
        Verifies that the given credential is usable by the user. The checks are performed in the following order:
        1. The credential is checked to see if the user is within the retry window
        2. The credential is checked to see if it's locked
        3. The credential's password is checked against rawPassword

        The return code then indicates the result: that the user must wait to retry their login, that their credential is locked, that the password doesn't match, or success. This will also take the additional step of updating the database count of failed login attempts (or clear it if necessary).

        The implementation of this is internal to ClaimCenter.

        Parameters:
        publicId - the public ID of the user record to test.
        rawPassword - The raw password to test.
        Returns:
        BAD_USER_ID if the publicId doesn't correspond to an actual user, WAIT_TO_RETRY if the user must wait before trying to login again, CREDENTIAL_LOCKED if the user's credential has been locked, PASSWORD_MISMATCH if the passwords don't match, and SUCCESS if the the credential is unlocked and the passwords match

      • modifyUser

        void modifyUser(java.lang.String publicId,
              UserValueNVP[] pathValues)
        Modifies the information in the user data object. All data in this object is taken as a modification.
        Parameters:
        publicId - the user's public id
        pathValues - The user data to store in the database.
